mapper.select: select id, student_id, password, email, openid, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(student_id, password, email, openid, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{studentId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{openid}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into sys_user(student_id, password, email, openid, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.studentId}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.openid}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into sys_user(student_id, password, email, openid, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.studentId}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.openid}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update student_id = values(student_id), password = values(password), email = values(email), openid = values(openid), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_user
student_id = #{studentId},
password = #{password},
email = #{email},
openid = #{openid},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
